text: The Daniel Webster Wallace Unit is a state prison for men located in Colorado City, Mitchell County, Texas, owned and operated by the Texas Department of Criminal Justice. This facility was opened in May 1994, and holds a maximum of 1428 male prisoners, held at security levels G1, G2 and G4. The facility is adjacent to the state's Dick Ware Transfer Facility. ==References== Category:Prisons in Texas Category:Buildings and structures in Mitchell County, Texas Category:1994 establishments in Texas
title: Daniel Webster Wallace Unit
